articles.title: Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Friday sent a message of greeting to Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran. 
					The Iranian people are conducting a dynamic struggle to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of the Islamic revolution, the message said. 
					
					It wished the Iranian president and people bigger successes in the work for building stronger Islamic Republic, expressing belief that the favorably developing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger in all fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian First Vice-President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian First Vice-President
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim sent a message of greeting to Mohammad-Reza Rahimi, first vice-president of Iran, on Friday on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran. 
					The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger in their common interests. 
					
					Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Iranian counterpart Ali Akbar Salehi on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Placed before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Placed before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the lunar New Year, Juche 102 (2013).
					Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs, enterprises, factories, farms and schools in the city, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					Also laid there were floral baskets in the name of overseas Koreans, and bouquets.
					
					Masses paid respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in humble reverence.
					
					Placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their smiling portraits in different parts of the city including Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the Mansudae Art Studio and in provincial seats were floral baskets in the name of units of the KPA and organs, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK People Pay Tribute to Generalissimos on Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
DPRK People Pay Tribute to Generalissimos on Lunar New Year's Day
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- On the morning of lunar New Year's Day, the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have paid their highest tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					An endless stream of visitors with floral baskets and bouquets in their hands was flowing to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits and large-sized mosaics picturing their smiling images throughout the country.
					
					Kim Kwang Su, a citizen living in Kallimgil-dong No.2, Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					My family would come here, where mosaics depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand, on holidays with flowers cultivated at home.
					
					What the Korean people wish on this day is the immortality of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as well as good health of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					I will remain intensely loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Schoolchildren Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day with Folk Games
articles.content:
DPRK Schoolchildren Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day with Folk Games
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have enjoyed the lunar New Year's Day with folk games.
					In this regard, Choe Yong Sop, an official of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, told KCNA:
					
					Folk games of schoolchildren took place in Pyongyang and other areas to whip up the festive mood.
					
					Schoolchildren in Central District of Pyongyang launched competitions of kite-flying, top spinning and other folk games at Kim Il Sung Square early in the morning.
					
					Carried in most of the kites were such letters as "Our satellite" and "Satellite launch".
					
					Among those children were boys playing shuttlecocks and girls playing skipping.
					
					Those in Phyongchon District staged folk games in the plaza of Pyongyang Indoor Stadium. What drew attention was the maypole dancing.
					
					Plazas of the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Party Founding Memorial Tower and other parts of Pyongyang, too, were crowded with schoolchildren playing various folk games and adults watching them.
					
					Sports and amusement games of schoolchildren were held in other cities, including Phyongsong City of South Phyongan Province and Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea enjoyed the lunar New Year's Day (February 10).
					Displayed in streets of Pyongyang, Hamhung, Sariwon and other cites of the country were national flags and celebrating boards, lanterns, banners and other ornaments.
					
					Art performances were given at theatres and cultural houses, including the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Moranbong Theatre and the Hamhung Grand Theatre, adding to festive mood.
					
					Public catering service facilities served such traditional dishes as Pyongyang cold noodle, sinsollo and casserole to delight the people enjoying the holiday. Put on sale at open-air booths were roast chestnut, sweet potato and peanut.
					
					In Pyongyang, folk games of schoolchildren took place at Kim Il Sung Square and in plazas of the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other parts of the city. Those children enjoyed a happy holiday, playing such games as kite-flying, skipping, shuttlecock and top-spinning.
					
					Some citizens were seen playing Yut-game, Korean chess and other folklore games at houses with neighbors.
					
					In the evening citizens in Pyongyang, Wonsan, Nampho and other cities of the country had a nocturnal view of cities, walking along streets decorated with colorful electric light.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Japan's Childish Action
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Japan's Childish Action
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Japanese dietmen recently submitted a "resolution" slandering the DPRK at the recent 21st annual session of the Asia-Pacific parliamentary forum.
					The "resolution" said that the DPRK's satellite launch threatens the peace and security in every part of the world and it was the violation of the "resolution" of the UN Security Council.
					
					Ridiculous is that they went reckless to include such phrases as "conducting an investigation into the abduction issue" and "banning proliferation of WMD" in the "resolution".
					
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					Such a mean behavior as imploring lawmakers of foreign countries to support the "resolution" clearly proves how narrow-minded and childish Japs are.
					
					This shows the base nature of the Japanese reactionary ruling circles who dislike when things go well in other countries.
					
					The DPRK does not feel any need to explain the peaceful nature of its satellite to the fault-finders whose way of thinking is not normal. It was because this was made clear in the statements issued by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and its Foreign Ministry, and those Japanese are unable to understand it.
					
					But the DPRK can not but disclose the aim sought by the Japanese in their demeanor.
					
					Shortly ago, Japan fired another spy satellite into outer space.
					
					As a matter of fact, it is not proper for the war criminal state to have a spy satellite, and it is also in violation of the treaties on the peaceful use of space.
					
					Japan is trying to cover up its move to turn itself into a military giant by creating the atmosphere of bitterness toward the DPRK.
					
					Although Japan is seeking to demonstrate its "principled diplomacy" through the anti-DPRK racket, it can never be free from the pitiful plight of a marionette of the U.S.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Censured for Sentencing Vice-Chairman of South Headquarters of Pomminryon to Penal Servitude
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Censured for Sentencing Vice-Chairman of South Headquarters of Pomminryon to Penal Servitude
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued the following statement on Sunday:
					The puppet group of traitors of south Korea on Feb. 8 held a trial of Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and sentenced him to four years in prison and four years of suspension of qualification on charges of the violation of the notorious "Security Law". Ro Su Hui visited Pyongyang to express condolences over the great loss to the nation.
					
					The south Korean group even detained the secretary general of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and sentenced him to three years in prison and three years of suspension of qualification, charging that he helped Ro Su Hui make an "illegal entry to the country". He was on a sickbed after being diagnosed as cancer.
					
					As well known, Ro Su Hui visited Pyongyang carrying the unanimous respects of south Koreans for leader Kim Jong Il despite cordon and expressed deep condolences at the memorial service marking the 100 days since the demise of the leader. He is a pro-reunification patriot who shared the grief with the compatriots in the north and refreshed his pledge to work for national reconciliation, unity and national reunification.
					
					Ro Su Hui's Pyongyang visit was an admirable act to express condolences that was prompted by his conscience, faith and moral obligation as a member of the nation over the unexpected loss of the father of the nation who provided the fellow countrymen with the historic north-south joint declarations and opened the bright prospect for national reunification in the new century.
					
					However, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors committed harsh violence against Ro and carried him away in a headlock when he crossed the central demarcation line of Panmunjom to return to south Korea amid the concern of the Koreans and the world. The group inflicted all mental and physical pain on him for over 7 months of detention and finally imposed severe punishment on him.
					
					The North Headquarters of Pomminryon strongly denounces the suppression of the vice-chairman and the secretary general of Pomminryon South Headquarters as an intolerable mockery to the national unity and the desire for reunification and a challenge to the DPRK.
					
					During five years in office, the Lee group desperately stood in the way of the advance of the June 15 era of independent reunification and plunged the north-south relations full of excitement and jubilation for reconciliation and cooperation into a complete deadlock through the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and war. Not content with this, the group found fault with the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes and has worked desperately to strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					South Koreans from all walks of life are shuddering at the Lee group's thrice-cursed crimes and are waging stronger actions against its moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					The heavy penalties imposed on members of the reunification movement organization including Ro who have staged righteous activities for the national reconciliation, unity and reunification are aimed to create a terror-ridden atmosphere of suppression under the pretext of public security, dampen the mounting spirit for reunification through alliance with the north and escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					All Koreans will never pardon the Lee group's unethical crimes against reunification.
					
					The matchless confrontation maniacs can never evade the stern punishment of history and the nation even after they leave office.
					
					The south Korean puppet authorities have to repeal the ill-famed "Security Law" and set free at once Ro Su Hui and other pro-reunification patriots.
					
					We appeal to organizations and people of various circles of south Korea to turn out in a nationwide action to wipe out the Lee group keen on enforcing a fascist rule and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, and achieve independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: UN "Resolution on Sanctions" Termed Fraud Document: Koreans' Organization in Germany
articles.content:
UN "Resolution on Sanctions" Termed Fraud Document: Koreans' Organization in Germany
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany posted on its website an article denouncing the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					The "resolution on sanctions" the U.S. and its allies cooked up by instigating the UNSC, in fear of the DPRK's highly developed technology of space development, is a fraud document, the article said, and went on:
					
					Most of those countries which participated in the adoption of the "resolution" have the record of launching satellites with long-range rockets, and Japan launched a spy satellite after the adoption of the "resolution".
					
					It is sheer nonsense to call what the DPRK launches a ballistic missile and what and the U.S. and other countries launch a satellite.
					
					If the UNSC remains biased and acts as a hand-raising machine of the U.S., its existence will be of no worth.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" against DPRK Denounced by Spanish Political Party, Organization
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" against DPRK Denounced by Spanish Political Party, Organization
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of the People of Spain and the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain, its affiliated organization, released a joint statement on Jan. 30 denouncing the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK.
					The statement said:
					
					It is a universally recognized right of each country to study and develop space for peaceful purposes.
					
					Many countries have so far launched satellites not only for peaceful purposes but for military purposes.
					
					The principle of equality is stipulated even in the U.N. Charter. But this principle and international law have been abused as tools for imposing the imperialists' interests for decades.
					
					The "resolution" adopted by the UNSC as regards the launch of the DPRK's satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 is not aimed at complying with the international treaties on the development of space.
					
					It reflects the interests of the U.S. which has hindered the DPRK's socialist construction while keeping its forces in south Korea.
					
					The statement condemned some countries for conspiring for the adoption of the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, to meet the U.S. demand in the UNSC.
					
					It said that the working class and peoples of the world would stand by the Korean people in the struggle for advancing the cause of socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: Indonesian Political Party Supports DPRK's Resolute Measure
articles.content:
Indonesian Political Party Supports DPRK's Resolute Measure
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Pioneer Party of Indonesia released a statement on Feb. 4 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the statement and memorandum of its Foreign Ministry.
					The UN Security Council's "resolution" masterminded by the U.S. is peppered with vicious hostile steps aimed to ban the DPRK's satellite launch and hinder it from developing economy and bolstering national defence capabilities, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Satellite launch is an independent right of each country and the exercise of the sovereignty publicly recognized by international law. The U.S. and other countries, therefore, have no justification to say this or that over the satellite launch.
					
					We send support to the DPRK which turned out in an all-out action to bolster the self-defensive military muscle including a nuclear deterrent both in terms of quality and quantity, foil the hostile policy of the U.S. and dishonest forces following it towards the DPRK and defend the sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					There is still no institutional mechanism that guarantees peace on the Korean Peninsula but the instable state of armistice has persisted although 60 years have passed since the war ended.
					
					The dissolution of the "UN Command", ghost of the Cold War, is prerequisite to defending the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on February 4 under the co-sponsorship of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia and the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange.
					Eko Suryo Santjojo, general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					It decided to organize diverse events praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period between February 4 and 17.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan, India
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan, India
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Events were held on February 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					They included a seminar in Kyrgyzstan and a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show in India.
					
					Seen in the venue of the exhibition were photos on his exploits.
					
					On display there were his works and other Korean books and photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding statesman and iron-willed brilliant commander who increased the national power of socialist Korea with his unique Songun politics.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un energetically works to turn socialist Korea into a powerful state looked up by the world, true to the high intention of Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding:
					
					As long as there exists the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea and advantageous socialist system which Kim Jong Il developed, the Korean people will build a thriving nation without fail.
					
					B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, great statesman, iron-willed brilliant commander and benevolent father of the people.
					
					He went on:
					
					The DPRK successfully launched the satellite under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un by creditably carrying forward the Songun cause of Kim Jong Il. It is working hard to build a thriving socialist nation while resolutely frustrating the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" cooked up by the U.S. and its allies.
					
					The immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the cause of global independence will be kept forever in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee to mark the 71st birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Sofia on February 5.
					Simeon Ignatov, vice-president of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union who doubles as chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					It decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il, the Songun leadership exploits of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the efforts of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation, and organize diverse events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Great Men to Be Celebrated in Myanmar
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Great Men to Be Celebrated in Myanmar
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar preparatory committee to mark the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 71st birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on February 4.
					The preparatory committee decided to organize political and cultural events including meeting, friendly meeting, film show and photo exhibition in the period between February and April on the occasion of their birth anniversaries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Figures of Ecuador, Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Figures of Ecuador, Romania
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Events were held on February 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					They included a lecture, book exhibition and film show in Ecuador and seminar in Romania.
					
					The president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador said:
					
					Generalissimo Kim Jong Il frustrated the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK with his Songun politics and turned socialist Korea into a political and military power and a nuclear weapons state. He was a great leader and an outstanding statesman in the 21st century as he made an immortal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un demonstrated the might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the great Paektusan nation with the Songun politics by carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					It is a sacred duty of all the progressive people in the world to defend the DPRK, fortress of socialism, in reaction to the UN Security Council's "resolution" that found fault with the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and the frantic hostile policy towards the DPRK on the part of the U.S. and its allies.
					
					I extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just drive for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification.
					
					The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association referred to the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed and stressed that his exploits would be remembered long in the hearts of the Romanian people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on Feb. 1 and 2 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Myanmar Herald carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					The paper in an article entitled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism" praised him, eternal leader of the Korean people, as a model patriot.
					
					His affection for the country was the most sincere and ardent, the article said, explaining how strong his patriotism was.
					
					Nigerian Observer carried an article titled "Feats for socialist cause" that lauded the feats he performed in reliably defending the socialist cause under the banner of Songun. 
					
					The DPRK resolutely meeting every challenge and smashing threats of the imperialists and maintaining the socialist cause are instilling great confidence and courage into the world progressive people, the article noted.
					
					His undying exploits for the socialist cause would be remembered in the hearts of progressive humanity forever, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet on February 5 by a publishing house in Lima City, Peru.
					The work, made public on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies an idea that the Juche philosophy is a unique one that was developed and systematized based on its own principles and a revolutionary and popular one that serves the purpose of the people's struggle for independence.
					
					The work also indicates tasks for studying and explaining the Juche philosophy as intended by the Workers' Party of Korea and thoroughly embodying it in the revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported in 3rd All-India Women's Congress
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported in 3rd All-India Women's Congress
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 3rd All- India Women's Congress in Kerala State, India from Jan. 29 to 31 expressed full support and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people.
					The secretary general of the All-India Organizing Committee for Women's Culture said at the forum for women against imperialism:
					
					The DPRK is a socialist country fighting against imperialism.
					
					The U.S. is viciously moving to prevent other countries from having nukes while threatening many countries with nukes.
					
					The DPRK is standing firm against U.S. imperialism by building a nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					We should positively support the Korean people in their struggle for firmly defending socialism against imperialism.
					
					The chairwoman of a Nepali women's revolutionary organization said in a speech: The DPRK is a model of the just struggle of the world progressive people aspiring after socialism and fighting against capitalism and imperialism. The Nepali people will stand by the Korean people in the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					A special statement for the DPRK which was adopted at the congress said that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities should immediately withdraw the anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK, and the U.S. should respond to the proposal advanced by the DPRK to put an end to the state of armistice on the Korean Peninsula and to build durable peace-keeping mechanism.
					
					Korea's reunification should be achieved independently and peacefully by the Korean nation itself, and outside forces and their allies should stop acts hostile toward the DPRK, the statement emphasized.
					
					It extended support and encouragement to the Koreans in their efforts to defend the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving socialist country, rallied close around their supreme leader.

articles.title: Figure of Regional Organization Supports DPRK
articles.content:
Figure of Regional Organization Supports DPRK
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, made public articles in the Jordanian newspaper Al Diyar on January 30 and 31.
					The author in an article titled "Songun of Korea" wrote:
					
					A new turning phase for prosperity opened in the DPRK in a short period under the guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un leading the revolution with the Songun politics.
					
					The recent UN Security Council's "resolution" is a product of blatant, biased and frantic hostile policy of the U.S. towards the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK has the full-fledged right to conquer and use space for peaceful purposes as other countries.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK declared that they would never pardon but mercilessly punish those who make provocations against them.
					
					The Korean People's Army has grown up to be a matchless army with the Juche-oriented strategy, tactics and war method, the capabilities for fighting an actual war and powerful arms and equipment.
					
					The KPA holding Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in high esteem as its supreme commander will as ever successfully fulfill its honorable mission by frustrating the aggressive moves of the enemies.
					
					The author said in an article titled "Way to hell":
					
					The U.S. and its allies' maneuvers to stifle the DPRK are bound to meet failure.
					
					The U.S. has tried to suffocate the DPRK, but its despicable efforts are bound to meet the DPRK's counterattack.
					
					The DPRK will annihilate the aggressors and turn their stronghold into hell.

articles.title: International Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
articles.content:
International Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The international preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia on February 1.
					A decision on the inauguration of the preparatory committee was made public by the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize a meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show and give robust publicity promotion through media including websites on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Political Party of Myanmar Supports Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Political Party of Myanmar Supports Korean People's Struggle
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will more dynamically advance with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in successfully launching the satellite under the wise leadership of the dear respected HE Kim Jong Un. They will receive positive support from the progressive people of the world.
					The Myanmar preparatory committee to mark the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 71st birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il said this in an information bulletin on February 4.
					
					The bulletin said that the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar is glad to form the preparatory committee to significantly celebrate the birth anniversaries of the peerlessly great men together with the Korean people.
					
					It went on:
					
					The Korean people and world progressives hold colorful events in boundless reverence for the great leaders on the auspicious occasions.
					
					Preparatory committees to mark their birth anniversaries have been inaugurated in different countries for significantly recollecting their immortal exploits.
					
					The Myanmar preparatory committee calls for expressing the support and solidarity for the Korean people in their efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country as bequeathed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
